page.title: 18RECREATION IN THE VILLAGES.
page.content: The villagers have a variety of recreational activities. All kinds of sports are popular with participants and spectators. Television is one of the main pastimes commonly coupled with a video cassette recorder to allow people to schedule programmes to suit themselves.Most households own stereo equipment allowing people to enjoy recorded music of every style. National and local radio and Citizens Band radio providing two way communication are other popular pursuits. Many people enjoy dancing in various styles ranging from Country, Old Tyme, ballroom to disco and Rock and Roll. Rugby,cricket. football, swimming,skittles,snooker etc. are common particpatory sports.
